abstract: The report, due later this year, suggests that world’s top 3,000 companies cause $2.2 trillion dollars in environmental damage per year.
snippet: The report, due later this year, suggests that world’s top 3,000 companies cause $2.2 trillion dollars in environmental damage per year.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations report to be released this spring finds that the world’s top 3,000 companies cause $2.2 trillion in environmental damage per year, according to the consulting company commissioned to write the report.

headline.main: U.N. Report to Quantify the Environmental Impact of Major Companies
